trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for viewers that are intended to display fixed or flow content (represented by a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument"></xref>, respectively).
trans-unit.target: 提供要用來顯示的檢視器固定或非固定格式內容的基底類別 (由<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument"></xref>分別)。

trans-unit.source: DocumentViewerBase is a minimal base class, intended to provide only basic functionality that is common across document viewing scenarios.
trans-unit.target: DocumentViewerBase 是最小的基底類別，用來提供，而且是一般的文件檢視案例只基本的功能。

trans-unit.source: This base class provides no user interface.
trans-unit.target: 這個基底類別會提供任何使用者介面。

trans-unit.source: Initializes base class values when called by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化基底類別值由衍生類別呼叫時。

trans-unit.source: Cancels any current printing job.
trans-unit.target: 取消任何目前的列印工作。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether or not the viewer can jump to the next page in the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document*>.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出在檢視器可以跳到目前<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document*>的下一個頁面

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: **true** if the viewer can jump to the next page; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果檢視器可以跳到下一個頁面中; 否則**false**。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性就沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToNextPage*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToNextPage*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToNextPage*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToNextPage*> dependency property key.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToNextPage*>相依性屬性索引鍵。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToNextPage*>

trans-unit.source: If you derive from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>, you need this key in order to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToNextPage%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>，您需要此金鑰，才能設定的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToNextPage%2A>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToNextPage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%28System.Windows.DependencyPropertyKey%2CSystem.Object%29>, passing CanGoToNextPagePropertyKey as the `key` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%28System.Windows.DependencyPropertyKey%2CSystem.Object%29>，傳遞做為 CanGoToNextPagePropertyKey`key`參數。</xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%28System.Windows.DependencyPropertyKey%2CSystem.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether or the viewer is able to jump to the specified page number.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出是否或檢視器，則可以跳至指定的頁面數目。

trans-unit.source: A page number to check for as a valid jump target.
trans-unit.target: 檢查做為有效的跳躍目標的頁碼。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether or the viewer is able to jump to the specified page number.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出是否或檢視器，則可以跳至指定的頁面數目。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether or not the viewer can jump to the previous page in the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document*>.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出在檢視器可以跳到目前<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document*>中的上一頁

trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: **true** if the viewer can jump to the previous page; otherwise, **false**.
trans-unit.target: **true**如果檢視器可以跳至前一個頁面中; 否則**false**。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性就沒有預設值。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToPreviousPage*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToPreviousPage*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToPreviousPage*>相依性屬性索引鍵。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToPreviousPage*>

trans-unit.source: If you derive from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>, you need this key in order to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToPreviousPage%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>，您需要此金鑰，才能設定的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToPreviousPage%2A>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToPreviousPage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%28System.Windows.DependencyPropertyKey%2CSystem.Object%29>, passing CanGoToPreviousPagePropertyKey as the `key` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%28System.Windows.DependencyPropertyKey%2CSystem.Object%29>，傳遞做為 CanGoToPreviousPagePropertyKey`key`參數。</xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%28System.Windows.DependencyPropertyKey%2CSystem.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.IDocumentPaginatorSource"></xref> to be paginated and displayed by the viewer.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.IDocumentPaginatorSource"></xref>編頁且以檢視器顯示。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.IDocumentPaginatorSource"></xref> to be paginated and displayed by the viewer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.IDocumentPaginatorSource"> </xref>編頁且以檢視器顯示。

trans-unit.source: The default property is **null**.
trans-unit.target: 預設屬性是**null**。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Causes the viewer to jump to the first page of the current document (represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document*> property).
trans-unit.target: 會造成跳至目前的文件的第一頁的檢視器 (由<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document*>屬性)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage*> attached property for a specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage*>附加指定的相依性物件的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage*>

trans-unit.source: The master page corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> object (in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A> collection) that includes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A> attached property with a value of **true**.
trans-unit.target: 主版頁面對應<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView>物件 (在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A>集合)，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A>附加屬性值為**true**。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A dependency object from which to retrieve the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage*>.
trans-unit.target: 要從中擷取<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage*>值的相依性物件

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage*> attached property, read from the dependency object specified by *element*.
trans-unit.target: 值<> *> 附加屬性，從所指定相依性物件中讀取*元素 *。

trans-unit.source: Raised if element is .
trans-unit.target: Raised if element is .

trans-unit.source: Returns the current master <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView"></xref> for this viewer.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前的主機<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView"></xref>這個檢視器。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> provides a viewport for a particular page of content (represented by an underlying <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage>).
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView>提供特定的頁面上的內容檢視區 (由基礎<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage>)。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView>

trans-unit.source: The master page corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> object (in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A> collection) that includes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A> attached property with a value of **true**.
trans-unit.target: 主版頁面對應<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView>物件 (在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A>集合)，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A>附加屬性值為**true**。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current master <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView"></xref> for this viewer, or **null** if no master <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView"></xref> can be found.
trans-unit.target: 目前的主機<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView"></xref>這個檢視器，或**null**如果沒有主<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView"></xref>可以找到。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new, read-only collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView"></xref> objects that are associated with the current display document (represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document*> property).
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回新、 唯讀集合的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView"></xref>關聯到目前的物件顯示文件 (由<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document*>屬性)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> provides a viewport for a particular page of content (represented by an underlying <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage>).
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView>提供特定的頁面上的內容檢視區 (由基礎<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage>)。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> on the first call to GetPageViewsCollection or if the collection has not changed since the previous GetPageViewsCollection call; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the collection has changed since the last GetPageViewsCollection call.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> GetPageViewsCollection 或自上次 GetPageViewsCollection 呼叫; 如果尚未變更集合的第一次呼叫否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>如果自上次 GetPageViewsCollection 呼叫後已變更集合。

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView"></xref> objects that are associated with the current display document.
trans-unit.target: 唯讀集合<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView"></xref>關聯到目前的物件顯示文件。

trans-unit.source: Causes the viewer to jump to a specified page number.
trans-unit.target: 會造成跳至指定的頁面數目在檢視器。

trans-unit.source: If *pageNumber* specifies an invalid page to go to (as indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToPage%2A> method), this method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 如果*pageNumber*指定無效的頁面，即可移至 (由<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToPage%2A>方法)，這個方法不會執行任何動作。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of the page to jump to.
trans-unit.target: 若要跳至頁面的頁碼。

trans-unit.source: Causes the working <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews*> collection to be re-built.
trans-unit.target: 會使工作<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews*>集合重新建置。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage*> attached property
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage*>附加屬性</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage*>的識別

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Causes the viewer to jump to the last page in the current document (represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document*> property).
trans-unit.target: 會造成跳到最後一個頁面中目前的文件檢視器 (由<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document*>屬性)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document*>

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator for the children in the logical tree of the viewer.
trans-unit.target: 取得檢視器邏輯樹狀中子系的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: If the viewer has no logical children, an empty enumerator is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果在檢視器有沒有邏輯的子系，則會傳回空白的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> object that can be used to enumerate the logical children of the viewer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>物件可以用來列舉檢視器的邏輯子系。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性就沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the page number for the current master page.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的主版頁面的頁碼。

trans-unit.source: The master page corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> object (in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A> collection) that includes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A> attached property with a value of **true**.
trans-unit.target: 主版頁面對應<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView>物件 (在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A>集合)，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A>附加屬性值為**true**。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The page number for the current master page, or **0** if no Document is currently loaded.
trans-unit.target: 目前的主版頁面的頁碼或**0**如果目前已不載入任何文件。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.

trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%28System.Windows.DependencyPropertyKey%2CSystem.Object%29>，傳遞做為 MasterPageNumberPropertyKey`key`參數。</xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%28System.Windows.DependencyPropertyKey%2CSystem.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Causes the viewer to jump to the next page in the current document (represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document*> property).
trans-unit.target: 會造成跳至下一個頁面中目前的文件檢視器 (由<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document*>屬性)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document*>

trans-unit.source: Builds the visual tree for the viewer.
trans-unit.target: 建置的視覺化樹狀檢視器。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked whenever <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用每當<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A>稱為。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnApplyTemplate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會覆寫<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnApplyTemplate%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.OnApplyTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Invoked whenever the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView"></xref> event reaches an element derived from this class in its route.
trans-unit.target: 叫用每當<xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView"></xref>事件到達衍生自這個類別，其路由中的項目。

trans-unit.source: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.
trans-unit.target: 實作這個方法可為此事件加入類別處理。

trans-unit.source: The base implementation of this method will cause the viewer to jump to the page indicated by *pageNumber*.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的基底實作會造成跳到所指定的頁面檢視器*pageNumber*。

trans-unit.source: The element from which the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView"></xref> event originated.
trans-unit.target: 從中的項目<xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView"></xref>引發的事件。

trans-unit.source: A rectangular region, in the coordinate space of `element`, which should be made visible.
trans-unit.target: 中的座標空間的矩形區域`element`，這應該會看見。

trans-unit.source: The page number for the page that contains `element`.
trans-unit.target: 包含頁面的頁碼`element`。

trans-unit.source: Raised if *element* is **null**.
trans-unit.target: 時引發*元素*是**null**。

trans-unit.source: Handles the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.CancelPrint*> routed command.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.CancelPrint*>路由傳送命令。</xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.CancelPrint*>

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.CancelPrint%2A> command is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.CancelPrint%2A>叫用命令。</xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.CancelPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> object for this viewer.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>這個檢視器的物件。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會覆寫<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> object for this viewer.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref>這個檢視器的物件。

trans-unit.source: Called whenever the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document*> property is modified.
trans-unit.target: 每當呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document*>屬性修改。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document*>

trans-unit.source: This method causes the working set of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> objects (represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A> property) to be invalidated and regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會造成工作集<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView>物件 (由<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A>屬性) 失效或重新產生。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView>

trans-unit.source: Invoked when the DPI scale changes.
trans-unit.target: DPI 比例變更時，便會叫用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the DPI of the flow document to the new scale.
trans-unit.target: 將固定格式文件的 DPI 設定新的小數位數。

trans-unit.source: The previous DPI scale setting.
trans-unit.target: 設定先前 DPI 縮放比例。

trans-unit.source: The new DPI scale setting.
trans-unit.target: 新的 DPI 比例設定。

trans-unit.source: Handles the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.FirstPage*> routed command.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.FirstPage*>路由傳送命令。</xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.FirstPage*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.FirstPage%2A> routed command causes the viewer to jump to the first page in the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.FirstPage%2A>路由傳送命令的原因，跳到目前<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A>的第一個頁面的檢視器</xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.FirstPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handles the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.GoToPage*> routed command.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.GoToPage*>路由傳送命令。</xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.GoToPage*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.GoToPage%2A> routed command cause the viewer to jump to an indicated page number in the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.GoToPage%2A>路由傳送命令的原因，跳到頁面中的代碼目前<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A>檢視器</xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.GoToPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToPage%2A> method indicates whether or not a specified page number is a valid page to jump to in the current document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToPage%2A>方法會指出指定的頁面數目是或不是有效的頁面，以跳至的目前文件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: If *pageNumber* specifies an invalid page to go to (as indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToPage%2A> method), this method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: 如果*pageNumber*指定無效的頁面，即可移至 (由<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToPage%2A>方法)，這個方法不會執行任何動作。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of the page to jump to.
trans-unit.target: 若要跳至頁面的頁碼。

trans-unit.source: Handles the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.LastPage*> routed command.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.LastPage*>路由傳送命令。</xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.LastPage*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.LastPage%2A> routed command causes the viewer to jump to the last page in the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.LastPage%2A>路由傳送命令原因跳到最後一個頁面，在目前<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A>檢視器</xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.LastPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: Called whenever the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.MasterPageNumber*> property is modified.
trans-unit.target: 每當呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.MasterPageNumber*>屬性修改。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.MasterPageNumber*>

trans-unit.source: The master page corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> object (in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A> collection) that includes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A> attached property with a value of **true**.
trans-unit.target: 主版頁面對應<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView>物件 (在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A>集合)，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A>附加屬性值為**true**。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handles the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.NextPage*> routed command.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.NextPage*>路由傳送命令。</xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.NextPage*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.NextPage%2A> routed command causes the viewer to jump to the next page (if available) in the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.NextPage%2A>路由傳送命令的原因，跳到下一個頁面 （如果有的話） 在目前<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A>檢視器</xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.NextPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToNextPage%2A> property indicates whether or not there is a next page to go to in the current document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToNextPage%2A>屬性會指出是否已移至目前的文件中的下一個頁面。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToNextPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: Called whenever the working set of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView"></xref> objects for this viewer (represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews*> property) is modified.
trans-unit.target: 每當工作集的呼叫<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView"></xref>這個檢視器的物件 (由<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews*>屬性) 會修改。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews*>

trans-unit.source: Handles the <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.PreviousPage*> routed command.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.PreviousPage*>路由傳送命令。</xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.PreviousPage*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.PreviousPage%2A> routed command causes the viewer to jump to the next page (if available) in the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.PreviousPage%2A>路由傳送命令的原因，跳到下一個頁面 （如果有的話） 在目前<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A>檢視器</xref:System.Windows.Input.NavigationCommands.PreviousPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToPreviousPage%2A> property indicates whether or not there is a previous page to go to in the current document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToPreviousPage%2A>屬性會指出是否已移至目前的文件中的上一頁。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.CanGoToPreviousPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handles the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Print*> routed command.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Print*>路由傳送命令。</xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Print*>

trans-unit.source: This method is called whenever the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Print%2A> command is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫每當<xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Print%2A>叫用命令。</xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Print%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of pages in the current <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document*>.
trans-unit.target: 取得在目前<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document*>的總頁數

trans-unit.source: This value is updated as content is paginated.
trans-unit.target: 這個值會隨著分頁的內容更新。

trans-unit.source: Because flow content has no notion of fixed pages, the value of this property may change if the viewer is resized, or if the content being displayed is modified.
trans-unit.target: 因為非固定格式內容沒有固定的分頁的概念，所以如果在檢視器可以調整大小，或修改要顯示的內容，就可能會變更這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The number of pages in the current document, or **0** if no document is currently loaded.
trans-unit.target: 在目前的文件中的頁數或**0**如果目前已不載入任何文件。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性就沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageCount*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageCount*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageCount*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageCount*> dependency property key.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageCount*>相依性屬性索引鍵。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageCount*>

trans-unit.source: If you derive from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>, you need this key in order to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageCount%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 如果您是衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>，您需要此金鑰，才能設定的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageCount%2A>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageCount%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%28System.Windows.DependencyPropertyKey%2CSystem.Object%29>, passing PageCountPropertyKey as the `key` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%28System.Windows.DependencyPropertyKey%2CSystem.Object%29>，傳遞做為 PageCountPropertyKey`key`參數。</xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.SetValue%28System.Windows.DependencyPropertyKey%2CSystem.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of the active <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView"></xref> objects contained within the viewer.
trans-unit.target: 取得作用中的唯讀集合<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView"></xref>包含在檢視器內的物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> provides a viewport for a particular page of content (represented by an underlying <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage>).
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView>提供特定的頁面上的內容檢視區 (由基礎<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage>)。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPage> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView>

trans-unit.source: The set of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> objects represented by the PageViews property is used by the viewer in order to display content.
trans-unit.target: 一組<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView>PageViews 屬性所代表的物件是由檢視者才能顯示內容。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView>

trans-unit.source: The master page corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> object (in the PageViews collection) that includes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A> attached property with a value of **true**.
trans-unit.target: 主版頁面對應<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView>物件 （在 PageViews 集合），其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A>附加屬性值為**true**。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A read-only collection of the active <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView"></xref> objects contained within the viewer.
trans-unit.target: 作用中的唯讀集合<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView"></xref>包含在檢視器內的物件。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性就沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView"></xref> items associated with this viewer (represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews*> property) changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView"></xref>這個檢視器相關聯的項目 (由<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews*>屬性) 變更。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Causes the viewer to jump to the previous page of the current document (represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document*> property).
trans-unit.target: 會造成跳至上一頁目前文件檢視器 (由<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document*>屬性)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document*>

trans-unit.source: Invokes a standard **Print** dialog which can be used to print the contents of the viewer and configure printing preferences.
trans-unit.target: 叫用標準**列印**可以用來列印內容的檢視器，並設定列印喜好設定對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: The following figure shows an example of a standard **Print** dialog.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示的標準範例**列印**對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: Note that the specific appearance of the **Print** dialog may vary depending on the hosting computer's configuration.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，特定的外觀**列印**對話方塊會根據主機服務的電腦組態而有所不同。

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: Print dialog box](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-print.png "Screenshot: Print dialog box")
trans-unit.target: ![螢幕擷取畫面︰ 列印對話方塊](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-print.png "螢幕擷取畫面︰ 列印 對話方塊")

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage*> attached property on a specified dependency object.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage*>附加指定的相依性物件的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage*>

trans-unit.source: The master page corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView> object (in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A> collection) that includes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A> attached property with a value of **true**.
trans-unit.target: 主版頁面對應<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView>物件 (在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A>集合)，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A>附加屬性值為**true**。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PageViews%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A dependency object on which to set the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage*>.
trans-unit.target: 要設定的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.IsMasterPage*>值的相依性物件

trans-unit.source: The new value to set the property to.
trans-unit.target: 若要將屬性設定為新的值。

trans-unit.source: Raised if *element* is **null**.
trans-unit.target: 時引發*元素*是**null**。

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies the type of service object to get.
trans-unit.target: 物件，指定要取得之服務物件類型。

trans-unit.source: A service object of type serviceType.
trans-unit.target: 型別的服務物件 serviceType 。

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類型或成員支援[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]基礎結構，不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: An object to add as a child.
trans-unit.target: 要加入做為子系的物件。

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類型或成員支援[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]基礎結構，不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: A string to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: 要新增至物件的字串。
